data.name: trigger
data.description: The element that triggers the opening of the component.

data.name: animate
data.description: Speed of the animation when the component is shown or hidden.

data.name: backdrop
data.description: Defines the backdrop behavior. It can be a boolean or a string.

data.name: closeOnEsc
data.description: Determines if the component should close when the Escape key is pressed.

data.name: position
data.description: Position of the component relative to the screen (top, end, bottom, start).

data.name: staticBackdrop
data.description: Determines if the backdrop should be static, preventing closing the component by clicking outside.

data.name: trigger
data.description: The element that triggers the opening of the component.
